<!-- Variable definitions -->
<Group description="Body"> <Variable name="body.background" description="Background" color="$(body.background.color)" type="background" default="$(color) none repeat scroll top left" value="$(color) none repeat scroll top left"/> <Variable name="body.background.color" description="Body background color" type="color" default="#fff" value="#ffffff"/> <Variable name="body.text.font" description="Font" type="font" default="$(loraNormal20)" value="400 20px Lora, serif"/> <Variable name="body.text.color" description="Color" type="color" default="#292929" value="#292929"/> <Variable name="body.link.color" description="Link color" type="color" default="#25a186" value="#25a186"/> <Variable name="body.link.visited.color" description="Visited link color" type="color" default="$(body.link.color)" value="#25a186"/> <Variable name="body.link.hover.color" description="Link Hover Color" type="color" default="$(body.link.color)" value="#25a186"/> <Variable name="blog.title.font" description="Blog Title Font" type="font" default="$(openSansBold24)" value="700 24px Open Sans, sans-serif"/> <Variable name="blog.title.color" description="Blog Title Color" type="color" default="#000" value="#000000"/> </Group>
<Group description="Featured post" selector=".heroPost"> <Variable name="heropost.main.background.color" description="Featured post main background color" type="color" default="#25a186" value="#25a186"/> <Variable name="heropost.main.title.color" description="Featured post main title color" type="color" default="#fff" value="#ffffff"/> <Variable name="heropost.main.text.color" description="Featured post main text color" type="color" default="#fff" value="#ffffff"/> <Variable name="heropost.main.button.color" description="Featured post main buttons color" type="color" default="#fff" value="#ffffff"/> <Variable name="heropost.main.link.color" description="Featured post main link color" type="color" default="#173752" value="#173752"/> <Variable name="heropost.secondary.background.color" description="Featured post background color (secondary)" type="color" default="#e5f0ee" value="#e5f0ee"/> <Variable name="heropost.secondary.text.color" description="Featured post text color (secondary)" type="color" default="#000" value="#000000"/> <Variable name="heropost.secondary.button.color" description="Featured post buttons color (secondary)" type="color" default="#25a186" value="#25a186"/> <Variable name="heropost.secondary.dropcap.color" description="Featured post drop cap color (secondary)" type="color" default="$(heropost.secondary.button.color)" value="#25a186"/> </Group>
<Group description="Header" selector=".centered-top-container"> <Variable name="header.background" description="Header Background" color="$(header.background.color)" type="background" default="$(color) none repeat scroll top left" value="$(color) none repeat scroll top left"/> <Variable name="header.background.color" description="Background color" type="color" default="#fff" value="#ffffff"/> <Variable name="header.description.font" description="Description font" type="font" default="$(openSansNormal14)" value="400 14px Open Sans, sans-serif"/> <Variable name="header.description.color" description="Description Color" type="color" default="rgba(0,0,0,0.54)" value="rgba(0,0,0,0.54)"/> <Variable name="header.pages.color" description="Page list color" type="color" default="#25a186" value="#25a186"/> <Variable name="header.pages.selected.color" description="Page list color (selected page)" type="color" default="$(header.pages.color)" value="#25a186"/> <Variable name="header.items.color" description="Text color" type="color" default="#25a186" value="#25a186"/> <Variable name="header.items.font" description="Text font" type="font" default="$(openSansSemibold14)" value="600 14px Open Sans, sans-serif"/> </Group>
<Group description="Search"> <Variable name="search.input.font" description="Input font" type="font" default="$(openSansSemibold16)" value="600 16px Open Sans, sans-serif"/> </Group>
<Group description="Feed" selector=".widget.Blog"> <Variable name="feed.title.font" description="Post title font" type="font" default="$(openSansBold36)" value="700 36px Open Sans, sans-serif"/> <Variable name="feed.title.color" description="Post title color" type="color" default="#25a186" value="#25a186"/> <Variable name="feed.subtitle.font" description="Post subtitle font" type="font" default="$(openSansSemibold16)" value="600 16px Open Sans, sans-serif"/> <Variable name="feed.subtitle.color" description="Post subtitle color" type="color" default="rgba(0,0,0,0.54)" value="rgba(0,0,0,0.54)"/> <Variable name="feed.text.font" description="Post text font" type="font" default="$(loraNormal20)" value="400 20px Lora, serif"/> <Variable name="feed.text.color" description="Post text color" type="color" default="rgba(0,0,0,0.84)" value="rgba(0,0,0,0.84)"/> <Variable name="feed.button.font" description="Button font" type="font" default="$(openSansSemibold14)" value="600 14px Open Sans, sans-serif"/> <Variable name="feed.button.color" description="Button color" type="color" default="#25a186" value="#25a186"/> </Group>
<Group description="Sharing" selector=".sharing"> <Variable name="sharing.background.color" description="Sharing background color" type="color" default="$(body.background.color)" value="#ffffff"/> <Variable name="sharing.text.color" description="Sharing text color" type="color" default="$(feed.button.color)" value="#25a186"/> <Variable name="sharing.icons.color" description="Sharing icons color" type="color" default="$(sharing.text.color)" value="#25a186"/> </Group>
<Group description="Dialogs" selector=".subscribe-popup"> <Variable name="dialog.title.font" description="Dialog title font" type="font" default="$(openSansBold24)" value="700 24px Open Sans, sans-serif"/> <Variable name="dialog.title.color" description="Dialog title color" type="color" default="rgba(0,0,0,0.84)" value="rgba(0,0,0,0.84)"/> <Variable name="dialog.input.font" description="Dialog input font" type="font" default="$(openSansNormal14)" value="400 14px Open Sans, sans-serif"/> <Variable name="dialog.input.color" description="Dialog input color" type="color" default="rgba(0,0,0,0.84)" value="rgba(0,0,0,0.84)"/> <Variable name="dialog.action.font" description="Dialog action font" type="font" default="$(openSansSemibold14)" value="600 14px Open Sans, sans-serif"/> <Variable name="dialog.action.color" description="Dialog action color" type="color" default="$(feed.button.color)" value="#25a186"/> </Group>
<Group description="Individual Post or Page" selector="body.item-page .widget.Blog"> <Variable name="item.title.font" description="Font" type="font" default="$(openSansSemibold48)" value="600 48px Open Sans, sans-serif"/> <Variable name="item.title.color" description="Post title color" type="color" default="#fff" value="#ffffff"/> <Variable name="item.title.background.color" description="Post title background color" type="color" default="#25a186" value="#25a186"/> <Variable name="item.subtitle.font" description="Post subtitle font" type="font" default="$(openSansSemibold16)" value="600 16px Open Sans, sans-serif"/> <Variable name="item.subtitle.color" description="Post subtitle color" type="color" default="rgba(0,0,0,0.54)" value="rgba(0,0,0,0.54)"/> <Variable name="item.byline.color" description="Post byline color" type="color" default="#25a186" value="#25a186"/> <Variable name="item.byline.font" description="Post byline font" type="font" default="$(openSansSemibold14)" value="600 14px Open Sans, sans-serif"/> <Variable name="item.action.color" description="Action color" type="color" default="#25a186" value="#25a186"/> <Variable name="item.action.font" description="Action font" type="font" default="$(openSansSemibold14)" value="600 14px Open Sans, sans-serif"/> <Variable name="item.label.font" description="Label font" type="font" default="$(openSansNormal14)" value="400 14px Open Sans, sans-serif"/> <Variable name="item.blockquote.font" description="Blockquote font" type="font" default="$(openSansSemiboldItalic44)" value="italic 600 44px Open Sans, sans-serif"/> </Group>
<Group description="Sidebar" selector=".sidebar-container"> <Variable name="sidebar.backgroundColor" description="Background color" type="color" default="$(body.background.color)" value="#ffffff"/> <Variable name="sidebar.icon.color" description="Icon color" type="color" default="#000" value="#000000"/> <Variable name="sidebar.separator.color" description="Separator color" type="color" default="#000" value="#000000"/> <Variable name="sidebar.widget.title.font" description="Gadget title font" type="font" default="$(openSansNormal16)" value="400 16px Open Sans, sans-serif"/> <Variable name="sidebar.widget.title.color" description="Gadget title color" type="color" default="#000" value="#000000"/> <Variable name="sidebar.profile.title.color" description="Profile name color" type="color" default="#000" value="#000000"/> <Variable name="sidebar.profile.text.color" description="Profile description color" type="color" default="#000" value="#000000"/> <Variable name="sidebar.profile.link.font" description="Profile link font" type="font" default="$(openSansSemibold16)" value="600 16px Open Sans, sans-serif"/> <Variable name="sidebar.profile.link.color" description="Profile link color" type="color" default="$(body.link.color)" value="#25a186"/> </Group>
<Variable name="attribution.text.font" description="Attribution text font" type="font" default="$(openSansSemibold14)" hideEditor="true" value="600 14px Open Sans, sans-serif"/> <Variable name="attribution.icon.color" description="Attribution icon color" type="color" default="rgba(0,0,0,0.54)" hideEditor="true" value="rgba(0,0,0,0.54)"/>
<Group description="Widths"> <Variable name="sidebar.width" description="Sidebar width" type="length" min="100px" max="1000px" default="320px" value="320px"/> <Variable name="feed.width" description="Content width" type="length" min="860px" max="1440px" default="1280px" value="1280px"/> </Group> */
body{ overflow-wrap:break-word; word-break:break-word; word-wrap:break-word } .hidden{ display:none } .invisible{ visibility:hidden } .container::after,.float-container::after{ clear:both; content:""; color:$(body.link.color); cursor:pointer; font-size:14px; font-weight:700; outline:0; text-decoration:none; text-transform:uppercase; width:auto } .dim-overlay{ background-color:rgba(0,0,0,.54); height:100vh; left:0; position:fixed; top:0; width:100% } #sharing-dim-overlay{ background-color:transparent } input::-ms-clear{ display:none } .blogger-logo,.svg-icon-24.blogger-logo{ fill:#ff9800; opacity:1 } .loading-spinner-large{ -webkit-animation:mspin-rotate 1.568s infinite linear; animation:mspin-rotate 1.568s infinite linear; height:48px; overflow:hidden; position:absolute; width:48px; z-index:200 } .loading-spinner-large>div{ -webkit-animation:mspin-revrot 5332ms infinite steps(4); animation:mspin-revrot 5332ms infinite steps(4) } .loading-spinner-large>div>div{ -webkit-animation:mspin-singlecolor-large-film 1333ms infinite steps(81); animation:mspin-singlecolor-large-film 1333ms infinite steps(81); background-size:100%; height:48px; width:3888px } .mspin-black-large>div>div,.mspin-grey_54-large>div>div{ background-image:url(https://www.blogblog.com/indie/mspin_black_large.svg) } .mspin-white-large>div>div{ background-image:url(https://www.blogblog.com/indie/mspin_white_large.svg) } .mspin-grey_54-large{ opacity:.54 } @-webkit-keyframes mspin-singlecolor-large-film{ from{ -webkit-transform:translateX(0); transform:translateX(0) } to{ -webkit-transform:translateX(-3888px); transform:translateX(-3888px) } } @keyframes mspin-singlecolor-large-film{ from{ -webkit-transform:translateX(0); transform:translateX(0) } to{ -webkit-transform:translateX(-3888px); transform:translateX(-3888px) } } @-webkit-keyframes mspin-rotate{ from{ -webkit-transform:rotate(0); transform:rotate(0) } to{ -webkit-transform:rotate(360deg); transform:rotate(360deg) } } @keyframes mspin-rotate{ from{ -webkit-transform:rotate(0); transform:rotate(0) } to{ -webkit-transform:rotate(360deg); transform:rotate(360deg) } } @-webkit-keyframes mspin-revrot{ from{ -webkit-transform:rotate(0); transform:rotate(0) } to{ -webkit-transform:rotate(-360deg); transform:rotate(-360deg) } } @keyframes mspin-revrot{ from{ -webkit-transform:rotate(0); transform:rotate(0) } to{ -webkit-transform:rotate(-360deg); transform:rotate(-360deg) } } .skip-navigation{ background-color:#fff; box-sizing:border-box; color:#000; display:block; height:0; left:0; line-height:50px; overflow:hidden; padding-top:0; position:fixed; text-align:center; top:0; -webkit-transition:box-shadow .3s,height .3s,padding-top .3s; transition:box-shadow .3s,height .3s,padding-top .3s; width:100%; z-index:900 } .skip-navigation:focus{ box-shadow:0 4px 5px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.14),0 1px 10px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.12),0 2px 4px -1px rgba(0,0,0,.2); height:50px } #main{ outline:0 } .main-heading{ position:absolute; clip:rect(1px,1px,1px,1px); padding:0; border:0; height:1px; width:1px; overflow:hidden } .Attribution{ margin-top:1em; text-align:center } .Attribution .blogger img,.Attribution .blogger svg{ vertical-align:bottom } .Attribution .blogger img{ margin-$endSide:.5em } .Attribution div{ line-height:24px; margin-top:.5em } .Attribution .copyright,.Attribution .image-attribution{ font-size:.7em; margin-top:1.5em } .BLOG_mobile_video_class{ display:none } .bg-photo{ background-attachment:scroll!important } body .CSS_LIGHTBOX{ z-index:900 } .extendable .show-less,.extendable .show-more{ border-color:$(body.link.color); color:$(body.link.color); margin-top:8px } .extendable .show-less.hidden,.extendable .show-more.hidden{ display:none } .inline-ad{ display:none; max-width:100%; overflow:hidden } .adsbygoogle{ display:block } #cookieChoiceInfo{ bottom:0; top:auto } iframe.b-hbp-video{ border:0 } .post-body img{ max-width:100% } .post-body iframe{ max-width:100% } .post-body a[imageanchor="1"]{ display:inline-block } .byline{ margin-$endSide:1em } .byline:last-child{ margin-$endSide:0 } .link-copied-dialog{ max-width:520px; outline:0 } .link-copied-dialog .modal-dialog-buttons{ margin-top:8px } .link-copied-dialog .goog-buttonset-default{ background:0 0; border:0 } .link-copied-dialog .goog-buttonset-default:focus{ outline:0 } .paging-control-container{ margin-bottom:16px } .paging-control-container .paging-control{ display:inline-block } .paging-control-container .comment-range-text::after,.paging-control-container .paging-control{ color:$(body.link.color) } .paging-control-container .comment-range-text,.paging-control-container .paging-control{ margin-$endSide:8px } .paging-control-container .comment-range-text::after,.paging-control-container .paging-control::after{ content:"\b7"; cursor:default; padding-$startSide:8px; pointer-events:none } .paging-control-container .comment-range-text:last-child::after,.paging-control-container .paging-control:last-child::after{ content:none } .byline.reactions iframe{ height:20px } .b-notification{ color:#000; background-color:#fff; border-bottom:solid 1px #000; box-sizing:border-box; padding:16px 32px; text-align:center } .b-notification.visible{ -webkit-transition:margin-top .3s cubic-bezier(.4,0,.2,1); transition:margin-top .3s cubic-bezier(.4,0,.2,1) } .b-notification.invisible{ position:absolute } .b-notification-close{ position:absolute; right:8px; top:8px } .no-posts-message{ line-height:40px; text-align:center } @media screen and (max-width:968px){ body.item-view .post-body a[imageanchor="1"][style*="float: left;"],body.item-view .post-body a[imageanchor="1"][style*="float: right;"]{ float:none!important; clear:none!important } body.item-view .post-body a[imageanchor="1"] img{ display:block; height:auto; margin:0 auto } body.item-view .post-body>.separator:first-child>a[imageanchor="1"]:first-child{ margin-top:20px } .post-body a[imageanchor]{ display:block } body.item-view .post-body a[imageanchor="1"]{ margin-left:0!important; margin-right:0!important } body.item-view .post-body a[imageanchor="1"]+a[imageanchor="1"]{ margin-top:16px } } .item-control{ display:none } #comments{ border-top:1px dashed rgba(0,0,0,.54); margin-top:20px; padding:20px } #comments .comment-thread ol{ margin:0; padding-left:0; padding-$startSide:0 } #comments .comment .comment-replybox-single,#comments .comment-thread .comment-replies{ margin-left:60px } #comments .comment-thread .thread-count{ display:none } #comments .comment{ list-style-type:none; entry.title: How to show love to your family
entry.content:
Have you ever thought about what legacy you will leave behind? It's a sobering thought, but one that can inspire us to do great things. Whenever I think about the fact that one day I will pass away and people will only remember what I did for them and the impact I had on their lives, it motivates me to take action and do what needs to be done. What about you? What kind of impact do you want to have? 

As long as you choose to leave behind a positive impact, let me unveil 5 tips for showing love to your family.

1. Communicate 

Unquestionably, we may not have much time, especially with work and personal activities in the way but life is too short to just hustle and make money without finding time to enjoy the work of your hands or at least enjoy with the people you work hard for. 

If you live or are far from home make it a goal to call or text your family and give them updates even just to talk and laugh don't make it a habit to only call when there is a problem or an emergency.  

What if you don't live too far away? It would be great if you could visit your family and surprise them with some fresh fruit. Even a quick visit to say "hi" will show them that you care. Although it may require a longer drive, it will be worth it to spend some quality time with your loved ones.

What if you live with your parents, how then could you show love to them? 

2. Action 

It's true that in some cultures, people don't express their love for each other with words as much as in others. However, showing kindness and care for those around us is always important. 

For example, if you see a pair of dirty shoes at the front door and you know one of them belongs to your sibling, instead of just cleaning your shoes, why not clean both pairs of shoes? These small acts of kindness can make a big difference in how we show our love and appreciation for the people in our lives.

3. Keep away the device

Have you ever ignored a family member because you were using your device? Or gotten lost in in a conversation because you received a text? No matter the reason why even if it was your boss calling In the long run, you would realize that the text was not as important as listening to your siblings and it truly hurts to not be able to turn back time to pay attention to what they have to say. 

It's always a good idea to devote your complete attention to your loved ones when you're spending time with them. To do so, you can keep your devices aside or switch off your internet and eliminate any distractions that might take away from your time with them. This way, you can have more meaningful interactions and make the most of your time together.

4. Gifts 

I know what you may be thinking when you see this point, you'll be like Where would I get the money. Surprisingly It's not about the amount of money you spend on the gift but it's about the motive, the love, and care behind the act.  It is always a good idea to get stuff for your family it could be something as small as their favorite snack or as big as a surprise party, anything to make them feel loved and cherished. When they truly feel your love, then you have met your target.

5. Positive language

Always remember to acknowledge and appreciate others when they do something well, and when they make mistakes, correct them respectfully and constructively. Focus on their specific mistakes and avoid generalizing, and always avoid speaking negatively about them in public. Let positivity guide your interactions with others. 

Dear emperors/empress 

      Thank you much much for reading!!

link.title: How to show love to your family

entry.title: Goals- How To Set And Achieve Them
entry.content:
Have you ever noticed those sharply dressed individuals confidently striding through the office, and wondered how they got there? Maybe you've admired someone doing a job you'd love to do, and keep telling yourself that someday you'll reach that level too. It's a common feeling, no matter what stage of life you're in.

Well, thats a goal you have set already. The big question is how do you work towards achieving it? To do this, we need understand the definition of a goal.

1.What is a goal?

A goal is an idea of the future that you envision, plan and commit to achieving in order to gain success. Or In simpler words it is something you want and you put your mind to getting. It could also be called a target. 

Ill like you to note that: the definition says an idea of the future that you envision or imagine and you plan on committing to. 

Meaning that you firstly need to have a clear picture of what you want. Secondly, you need to be willing to put in the needed effort in order to achieve it. 

Yes! You need to make goals which would really make you happy and proud of yourself when you accomplish them because it is usually not an easy process.

Surely you already have many goals you want to accomplish( there are some ideas below). So this very moment take a pen and a paper, write down neatly every goal you want to achieve. Then on the other side of the paper, state what you need to do to achieve each one. 

A goal could be long term or short term for example if you want to loose weight, that is a long term goal your Short term goal is to workout and eat healthier, thats what you do daily while waiting for the day you hit your target weight. 


2. Goals You Can Set  

You can have so many small goals in addition to your big one. Here are some ideas. 

1. To cultivate healthy habits 

-It could start from as little as making up your bed as soon as you wake up, which keeps your environment and your mind organized. 

-Exercising, walking, cycling or dancing 

-drinking a smoothie or warm water 

-journaling or writing a schedule 

-reading a book on a topic of interest to you (money, business, family, cooking) 

2. To Learn useful skills 

- this could be a skill that you could sell to for money to help you reach your money goals or a hobby  

- this may or may not be something related to your academic knowledge. For instance, you could learn to cook or bake. 

- Gardening is another thing you can do learn in your free time. Cultivating your own crops is a good way to stay healthy 

-you could also learn psychology on how to read the body language of people. 

3. To understand yourself, your emotions and your reactions. Also to improve any weak points found.

More words on: 

How to be a that girl 

4. To understand others around you too 

- you could do this by showing love them in simple ways 


3. How to achieve your goals

Congratulations! You are one step closer to a achieving your goals. The next step is even easier. In order for you not to just forget about these goals we are going to give ourselves 4 things: 

1- Time span 

Assuming that you start working on the goal today, write down a reasonable date within this year when youre supposed to have reached your target. If its a very very long term goal like building a house, then the date is for you to check your progress. 

2. Discipline 

Well, if one of youre goals was to loose weight then I definitely saw a workout for at least 30 minutes daily on that sheet. I know there would be those days when you dont feel like working out maybe youd rather watch a movie or just sleep but its in those days when you should remember what made you set the goal in the first place and how much of a loss you would make by just skipping a single day. 

3. Motivation

Yes you have to keep giving yourself the positive self talk, tell yourself everything you need to hear, encourage yourself to keep going towards you becoming a winner. When you achieve your goal for the day tell your self achieved. The feeling youll get is completely irreplaceable. 

4. Reward 

Yes after all your hard work you must definitely have something to look forward to. It could be anything so long as it doesnt take you back to square one of your goals.  

Now that you know how to set and achieve your goals, the next step is the hard part. To actually apply everything you have learnt. But I trust you my emperor and empress you can do it! you would definitely say achieved.

Dear Emperor/Empress 

         Thank you much much for reading!!

link.title: Goals- How To Set And Achieve Them

entry.title: 7 Tips For Better looks
entry.content:
Understandably, when it comes to looks and dress styles we all have our preferences. There is an old saying that goes one bad apple can ruin the entire basket of good apples it could mean many things but in this case of looks, it means that  if you have your outfit well planned out but you forget even just one thing, it could ruin your overall look. 

So how do you avoid ruining your entire look especially when you are trying leave a good impression?. 

Let me have the honor of revealing to you 7 things that can either make or break your look. 

1.Role model 

A role model is someone you can look up to and learn from when it comes to dressing most of the time we make the mistake of not choosing the correct role model. What do I mean? A good role model must have your body type and must  have a dress style you want to copy that is they should know how to match their outfits well which would really help you step up your game when it comes to dressing and looks in general. 

A word

Picking the wrong role model would cause you to pick the wrong outfits which may not really bring out your best look. 

2. Imagine 

You know how most girls spend hours and hours looking for the perfect outfit for the day, if the knew this tip they would save a whole lot of minutes. Using your imagination means creating  a mind picture of what you want to wear then, measure it to see if it fits and looks as nice as  you imagined it to.  

3. Colors 

Yes! Colours. They are the number one key to better looks. If it's going to be a happy and sunny day or party then, bright colours will fit best. Especially when you match the bright coloured or multi coloured top with darker shorts, skirts or jeans. 

Not only do they make you stand out, they make you seem approachable. If you noticed how the vilains in movies always wear dark colours then you'll get the point.

4. Highlight 

When people look at you their eyes naturally go to the bold or most colourful part of your outfit, the lines, or even the belt. Even when you choose your dresses, and your style, use this to your advantage to highlight either your upper or lower body depending on what you like and your body shape.

 For example puffy hands on a straight gown will look great on you if you have small shoulders. Vertical lines on your elastic  fitting gown makes you look more curvy as it follows your body shape and draws the attention of the eyes.

5. Shoes 

Like it or not, some people will find their eyes on you shoes and if they find it dirty or out of place then it wouldn't be a hit on the target. So what do we do, have at least one Black and one White sneaker and keep them as clean as possible because those are the basic colours that match with almost every outfit. As much as possible avoid wearing same colored jeans and shoes such as Black jeans and Black shoes. 

A word

If you wear socks in you sneakers (please do) let your socks stay in your shoes. Except if you have a long socks that goes all the way to your knees with shorts and you are going for a football player kind of look.

6. Setting 

When I talk of setting here I mean where are you going to, depending on where you are going to and how you are going to be addressed there would speak volumes of how you should look  

A word

It is usually said to dress the way you want to be addressed so if you want to be addressed as a professional then maybe you have to look like professional when your done dressing look at yourself in the mirror and ask yourself how would a random person address me?

7. Hair  

There is no way a fellow girl would have a conversation with you without mentally taking note or even mentioning your hairstyle or color. That is to show you how important your hair style is to your look. 

Styling your hair to match your your overall look thus, cannot be ignored, is just the bomb its like the final piece to the puzzle. it completes your  look. Therefore, what ever style you choose to do even if its just a ponytail, it should be clean and neat dont allow your hair look like you are having a bad hair day. The best part is you can try various styles to see the one which suits the look best.

A word 

If you do braids, dont allow it to get too old before you undo it. After one or two weeks of having braids, ensure to always do your edges. 

8. Posture 

No matter how good you look the way you carry your self and the posture you use when sitting could either make or break your look. As an Emperor or empress that you are when you walk you walk with grace one step at a time, one leg in front of the other, you dont pull you legs or worst of all you dont slouch either when sitting or walking your back is upright and your head is high. 

Dear Emperor/ Empress 

        Thank you much much for reading

entry.title: 7 Tips To Getting Out Of Extreme Sadness
entry.content:
Have you ever found yourself feeling so down, so weak internally just feeling like you want to lay in bed all day chilling and doing nothing really. Some times you dont even want to talk to anyone and you just wish someone could ask you how you are doing, someone you feel completely comfortable with so that you can just pour out your heart to them. But at the same time you dont want to talk because you know you are going to cry? 

Well we all have times like that and maybe even worse for some could it be because of stress or there is more. 

Let me do the honors of revealing the 5 ways to grow past these feelings and become the sparkling beauty we once were..

1. Smile 

The first step is really simple smile, yes! you can do it-come on-lets see your teeth alright-there you go. its that simple just smile or better still laugh out loud. laugh at the problems, smile at the challenges dont sit there and sulk because we both know youve already done enough of that now is time for you to grow. You are capable of growing because you are my emperor (or empress) and a king or a queen is a strong person so no more sulking, your kingdom (life) needs you. 

A word

If you want to feel bright then you have to look bright so take a good showers, wear the most colorful outfit in your closet put your good shoes on and feel free to look yourself in the mirror and say I look good so I feel good. Wear bright colors and wear a bright smile, pick bright flowers on your way out. Everything is bright!

2. Reflect

Ask yourself what do I feel is it anger or pain why Im I feeling this way? What am I thinking about? Why is this really bothering me so much? And other detailed questions such as: is it something that happened on this day? is it because of what you did or did not do to someone that hurt them? Or worse is it because of what they did to you? Or what you expected them to do and they didnt do?  Give the most honest answer you can to yourself and if more questions come up still answer them until you are satisfied with the answers. Until you get a complete understanding of what exactly is making you frown or cry.

A word 

If your feelings are more of anger, you might find this article helpful how to let go of anger 

3. Choose 

 When you know the reason behind your feelings it becomes easier for you to find the solution. To be very honest your solution lies with you in your heart. You have to make the choice to be happy the choice to let go of anger and the choice to smile. Sometimes feeling happy may mean stepping out of your comfort zone and doing some fun, crazy  stuff like, dancing to your favorite tune even if no one else is dancing, singing along with everyone even if you dont know the lyrics and other fun stuff you like. So now please dry your tears and turn that frown upside down. 

More words on: 

How to overcome self- doubt 


A word 

In life, all may not always go well and you can either choose to be cautious when things dont or stop trying its your choice, the former would help you learn and the later would leave you sulking


4. Stand up 

A wise person once said happiness is a journey not a destination so choose to enjoy every moment of your journey instead of waiting for the perfect scenario for happiness. 

You can do this in many ways one way is to stand up and do something you love it must be something that would make you stand up from your bed, interact with good people or see the sunshine. 

It could be something as simple as jogging if you like exercising or dancing to any beat of your choice even if you dont know how to dance  (Ill recommend Afro beats) or playing games with friends (not the ones on your device) or better still walking to a beautiful place nearby. When you go on that walk make sure to pick a flower for each color on the rainbow you could even try to make another flower out of two flowers.

A word 

Make being happy your lifestyle start by adding the words happy, joy, cheerful and its synonyms in to your vocabulary. You may also try listening to lively music ( you know the kind that makes you smile or makes you want to dance). Even though you may not like pictures now, just take pictures even if they are just selfies take them as memories and some day you would be happy you did. Try not to get involved in any bad habits or make any decisions in a rush as these would only harm you in the long run. 

5. Associates 

Friends, family members and who ever you associate yourself with often. May have a huge impact on your thoughts and behavior so associate yourself with people who care about you and give you positive energy and try to avoid those who make you feel bad about yourself or at least dont allow what they say get to you okay.

6. Believe in yourself 

No matter how many times I may tell you that you are strong and you are an overcomer, it would not make you feel better if you dont believe me. So, Im encouraging you to look in the mirror and Tell your self these all the positive things such as I am strong, I am powerful , I am worthy, I deserve to be loved and believe that they are true. 


A word 

You may choose to write down the quotes where you can easily glance through. You could add a smiley face you your favorite. Next, you could change the wallpaper of your phone to any positive quote you would like to see often.


More words on:

How to be confident 


Remember that you have just one life to live and ask yourself if my life was a fairytale how would I want the next chapter to be? Think of all the good things that can put a smile on your face and do them.

7. Gratitude 

This is just a fancy way of saying count your blessings, people usually get caught up worrying about what is going wrong that the forget to see what has been going right. So make this a part of your daily schedule to consciously appreciate 5 or more( but not less) good things that happened during the day.

Dear Emperor/Empress

           Thank you so much for reading!!

link.title: 7 Tips To Getting Out Of Extreme Sadness

Doesnt it just make you cringe when you see someone wearing their outfit the wrong way? Like I mean you just cant wear that beautiful skirt with that horrible top.

entry.title: Time management
entry.content:
If you discover you have a super power, what would you do? what if you discovered that everyone has that same superpower? The more you use it the strong you become and if you dont use it wisely it would be taken away from you. It comes as a surprise almost all the time when i remember that we all have 24 hours, i usually feel empowered i feel like that is my strength like that is the one thing we all have equally time. But you would agree with me that its not easy to get everything done by the end of the day is it? But guess what, it is possible. 

Let me have the honor of unveiling the secret right before your eyes..

1. Have a plan

Try to have a flash back of a typical day or week in your life. What does the day look like? What are your activities? Do you just wake up from sleep and start your rush hour three and before you realize it its already sunset? I promise you making a plan would save you from all of that. 

Making a plan 

A word 

Before you sleep today visualize how you want the next morning to be starting from the time when you wake up, to make your bead and brush your teeth. 

2. Be specific 

If you are a very busy person and have so many things to do, give time to each activity 

3.be disciplined 

Most of the time the problem is not that you dont know what to do but that, you dont want to do it at the moment. That is why we need doctor and nurse discipline to help treat this disease called procrastination. Follow your schedule

entry.title: 5 Reasons Why You Should Be Humble And Caring
entry.content:
Do you feel like being nice to people or treating them in the right way makes you weak? Or do you feel like they will loose their respect for you if you become nice? Is that what has made you hard and cold? Is there any reason why you should become nicer and more fun to be with?

Well, let me do the honors of unveiling the 5 secrets right before your eyes..... 

1. They are human 

What does it mean to be human? In short, It means to have feelings and emotions. Typically, all the people around you are human even the guy who opens the door or the lady in the cafeteria. They are human, have feelings and can get hurt by the things you say and do.They will be much happier to serve you treat them nicely or at least ask for help politely instead of offering more money or a higher position. 

2. It earns you more respect 

Being harsh and frightful forces people to respect you and it may fade away as soon as you loose the power to control them. Instead, when you earn the respect by treating others with respect, upholding virtues and principles, it will last a lifetime and they will miss you when you are absent. They will long for you to be present and even assist you in making right decisions. 

3.Your reputation

A wise man once wrote a good reputation is better than fine oil. This means no matter how successful you are the way you treat others has a huge role to play if you want to maintain a good name. If you have ever been treated unfairly, do you remember how you felt?Yes, people will always remember when you are kind to them, and they will also remember when you are unkind.

A word 

Its true that life is not a fairytale and there would always be the bad guys that are always bad no matter how you treat them. We trust you to be the good guy and know how to put the bad guy in their place without becoming one of them. 

4.For your future 

Life is unpredictable and we would never wish for anything unfortunate to happen but try to think for a second if all the things that are making you powerful now are taken away from you and you are put in the lower position of the people you are treating wrongly would you survive? Would you they happy to welcome you? Would you truly have someone to fall back on or are they only enduring your presence for what you have to offer? 

5. For yourself 

When you are humble and simple you stress less thinking about what others think about you, you would have more energy to focus on yourself and your likes. Youll have a deeper reason for doing what you do other than to rub your success in other peoples faces. 

Now that you know the importance of humility do you want to know what humility is?

Dear Emperor/Empress 

       Thank you much much for reading!!

link.title: 5 Reasons Why You Should Be Humble And Caring

entry.title: 6 Ways To Find Immediate Relief From Stress
entry.content:
Are you having a bad day? Do you usually feel the heat of a busy day so much that you just want a break? If yes, welcome to the club. I've been there, lived through it, and almost walked past it and you can too. 

The big question is How? Let me unveil the secrets right before your eyes...

1. Why are you stressed 

You may be wondering how I know you are stressed. (Here is how: 7 hidden signs of stress). As a wise lady once said, the first solution to a problem is to recognize that there is a problem.  Next, we go to the roots of the matter which is, identifying the cause of the problem.

 For this you need to give us very honest responses to these questions: what is stressing you out? Is it work, school, family, or something else? Who or what exactly about work is stressing you out? Is it the workload the amount of work time or what?

2. Relax

This is one thing you should do when you feel like things are becoming too much. Stop taking a moment to just breathe take slow and deep breaths focus on youre breathing and feel the tension in your body reduce. Whatever it is, know that you can handle it. It cannot be more than you I know that. 

3. Talk To a friend 

Everybody has that one bestie who will call them up in the middle of a busy day to say "I am stressed" or "This work is stressing me out".That's their way of airing out. Who do you call or talk to? Are you the bestie who everybody else calls? We can either fix that or find another way which is, you can write down how you feel in that classy diary of yours, feel free and write down exactly what you feel. 

More words on:

How to make real friends 

4. Live in the moment 

Worrying too much about what happened or what will happen will not change anything. You can only try to learn from your past mistakes in order not to repeat them in the future. So worry not about the past or the future just enjoy the beautiful moments in the present. Then you can attack the problems for the future when they come. 

A word 

Imagine stressing now about what would happen in the future and then worrying about it again after it has already happened it means you worked yourself out twice! 

For now, do that one thing you love, anything at all even just playing games (some find it helpful to get a snack) long as you feel truly happy and your mind is far away from what is stressing you.

 I would recommend dancing and singing out loud first of all because they will make you stand on your feet and secondly, it is much fun when you are singing out of pitch and are dancing off the beat cuz no one is watching. 

5. Take care of yourself 

You may worry so much about others and the stuff around you that you forget to worry about yourself. 

For one moment push all the worry away to create some time for you. Call it "me time" Take care of yourself, and take a cold or warm shower whichever you prefer. You could do your skincare routine, wear your nice dress and shoes, take pictures, put your favorite fruits on a plate, and enjoy their taste in your mouth. Do those little things that you have had on your schedule for a while and yet found no time to do them.

6. Exercise 

This doesnt only mean going for a jog or a run it can also be dance workouts if you are a music fan and you can call it your happy dance. Exercise helps your body release happy hormones that automatically switch up your mood.

You could also do outdoor walking regularly it would help you clear your head leaving you with a calm mind to find a solution to your problem.

A word 

It is not easy to avoid worry completely, but you can reduce how much you worry by applying all the above suggestions and looking for solutions to one problem at a time. 

For example, instead of thinking Oh my goodness I have an important presentation tomorrow and imagining all the worst things that could happen, think of the presentation and see all that you can do to prepare for in order not to make a mistake.

Dear Emperor/Emperor

Thank you so much for reading

link.title: 6 Ways To Find Immediate Relief From Stress

entry.title: Saving Swamps To Conserve Biodiversity In A changing Climate
entry.content:
Photo credit: Google 

In a far away village of Solaya there exists a beautiful swamp, in it lives a happy plant family.

  Its a beautiful morning mama plant (Marsh marigold)  says to baby plant yes mama baby plant replies looking at her mother. Turning to all the other plants (their family members) she says Good morning family they all smile knowing how happy she is since its a sunny day. 

                                 ****

Meanwhile, Billy a well educated young man in that village who comes to the swamp very early every morning to meditate while viewing the sunrise, is getting ready to leave though unhappy for he has noticed more plastics in the swamp even after he bought a recycle bin for the village use. 

                       ***

Hey the sun is up mama plant says its time to make our food but how will we make it baby plant asks. Excited mama plant replies we will use water and something in the air called carbon dioxide and then with the help of sunlight and a pigment we have, (chlorophyll) we will make our food (glucose).  Baby plant looks up at mama confused do you know the best part what baby says it gets easier as you grow up. 

Im really hungry so I better start making baby says. After a while baby plant asks what should I do with this other thing mama?.   Thats excellent your at the final step, just breathe it out the animals need it. Mama replies okay mama baby says happily. 

Satisfied with what he had accomplished baby plant starts exploring the swamp then he sees something strange MAMA it calls out come see this. Mama plant hurriedly comes to see OH NO!!mama says whats wrong? baby plant asked. Its that man again! He is taking our water, with all the things he has added to our home we might have to leave soon. Mama continues. Very sad she turns to tell the others then she notices one of the plants. OH NO!! its Rozy( rose mallow) she is getting weak, the water around her isnt clean it has all these dirt lets move it away. Everyone spread your roots mama says. 

So they spread their roots and pushed the bottles and plastic bags away then, they directed more water to her until she regained her strength a little.  Thank you all so much Rozy said but this wont last long, once the farmer is done, we will all be fighting for strength she continues. 

Photo credit: shutterstock.

Speechless, everyone just stared in silence. Lets all try to make more food before dusk mama says to break the silence. 

After a long night of thinking of what to do, Billy goes to the swamp the next morning with a rake and a wheelbarrow. He used the rake to gather all the plastics and he placed them in the wheelbarrow. After gathering everything he took the truck from door to door and showing each house the plastics explained why they shouldnt throw them in the swamp.

 In one of such houses he said Papa we have been blessed to have a beautiful swamp down the road do you know of it? Yes Papa Chidi replied With me I have all the plastics thrown into it would you like to know why I removed them?. Not waiting for a reply he continued When you throw things like plantain or banana peelings on the ground after some time they will become manure for our plants am I right?. He paused for their reply but they just nodded so he continued but these plastics on the other hand dont degrade or in simple terms they dont become manure, they can remain there for months hindering the growth of our plants and destroying the beauty of our swamp, neither you nor I want that so please putting his hands together he continued. Papa I beg of you to make use of the recycle bin placed at the village square. He concluded. 

Yes my son we have heard you turning to his 7 children and 2 wives he said have you heard?. Yes Papa they replied in unison. Thank you so much my son for the work you are doing, we are very happy to see children like you making use of their education he continued. Thank you too Papa.

Thats how he left each house with a smile on his face although some other houses had many more questions, they eventually accepted his request. 

The village chief also passed a decree that anyone found throwing plastics anywhere else but the recycle bin will have 1week of hard labor.

He had a good nights rest knowing the problem has been solved for all time. On arriving the swamp the next morning the smile on his face slowly faded and the whistling from his lips stops when he notices that the water level of the swamp has drastically reduced. 

He stood there in total disbelief until he started hearing the sound of someone tilling he followed the sound he was getting until he found the farmer working. Papa well done ohh. Billy said Thank you papa  Noma responded without looking up to see who it was. The sun these days is so hot sometimes it feels like its burning me. he continued haha Papa laughed lifting up his head and straightening his back Thats why I have to wear long sleeves while working to protect my skin Papa said in reply. You know, the sun keeps getting hotter and hotter for many reasons including human activities like these. Out of all the swamps I have seen in my life, this one is the most beautiful. It makes our village beautiful and unique. Papa  please dont destroy it Billy concludes with his hands together.

 Papa was left speechless for a while then he asked if I dont get water from here where else will I get water from? When you use this one this year what will you use next year? Billy asked and without waiting for a reply he continued  if you plant something like rice, you will preserve the beauty of the area and it will definitely do well. After a long silence Papa responded Okay my son I will  listen to you only because I want to try planting rice if it doesnt work know that I tried  thank you papa I know that it will work I will give you some tips. Now let me direct the water back into the swamp Billy concluded. 

                                 ***

Baby plant was so happy to wake up to so much water that she said  its a beautiful beautiful sunny watery morning while playing and stretching her roots a far as it could. All the plants smiled and joined her playing they were all so happy their home was saved!! 

                              ***

Thankfully, (after a lot of convincing from Billy) Papa Noma decided not to plant rice that year. In time, the swamp became more colorful and attractive due to the many plants and trees that had grown in it. Many more people noticed the beauty in the swamp and  started coming to there to meditate. All the children loved playing around there and the village chief made chairs available around the swamp for the tourists who came to visit the most beautiful swamp in the area.

                      The End

link.title: Saving Swamps To Conserve Biodiversity In A changing Climate

entry.title: 7 Hidden Signs Of Stress
entry.content:
In simple words stress is worry, it could be worry about a current situation or worry about a future matter.

All of us have at least one thing to be stressed about, it could be our looks, house issues along side school or work pressure and sometimes its all of the above and more. On regular days, we may be able to push it aside like strong girls but there are times when it takes more energy from us to handle the stress and thats where we need to be careful.

How do you know when the stress is too much?

Well, let's get right into the 7 hidden signs of stress that very few people recognize.....

1. You are talking to yourself 

I know we all talk to ourselves sometimes, like when you're make up is going wrong or you really have to go and no one is listening or you name it. This is a different kind of talk, its you using the least opportunity you get to be by yourself to think or worry about something or someone. Sometimes you dont know that you are deep in thought until that your one best friend calls your name about two or three times and you have to come up with a reason for being lost in thought.

2. You get pised off very easily

You start having terrible mood swings. You may be smiling this second because that colleague makes the ultimate joke you cant ignore but the next second youre deep in thought again with a frown on your face. When someone does something you could let go of, youll find yourself getting so angry that you may scold them not for what they did, but for what is stressing you out and if you say too much and its an emotional matter you may find yourself crying. 

3. You can't sleep 

The same you who used to sleep for more than 8 hours is now begging for two hours of sleep. Even when you finally sleep, the least noise wakes you up and you can't sleep anymore so you either get a late night snack or you you just lay awake thinking of those things that kept you awake in the first place.

Others sleep too much and still wake up tired or just feel some kind of fatigue through out the day. 

4. Your not smiling as much 

 This is a two way thing. Sometimes, people who used to smile all the time like your happy people whom you never find frowning? They may just start smiling less or put on that smile for the world to see but as deep down they are worried. 

On the other hand, the people who usually smile only few times may start making one too many laughs or start smiling way less than they usually do. 

5. Your loosing weight 

You are using so much energy thinking about your problem that you have none left to order food or worse cook. In fact, you dont feel real hungry so u can just sleep like that right. So you do that the first day and the next until your body breaks down. Unless of course you have a good friend or partner to force you to eat.

For some people, it is the direct opposite and they do what we call stress eating or they just generally gain weight because of their stress. 

This is a symptom that is easy to notice yet not easy to prevent

6. Your talking too much 

 It is at this point that you  discover that your close people will start asking if you are alright.

 Some people will free their minds and talk for long hours about what is stressing them out. While others talk about something completely different. Still, others say nothing at all or they say very little about what is going on to the people whom they know really care about them and want to listen. 

7. Your reading this article 

There can only be two reasons why you are reading this, it is either you feel the difference and you want to know what's up with you or you were just curious. Something tells me that, you can feel the difference, you know there is a stress problem and you want the solution.

That's what am I here for

Read more:

How to reduce stress 

 See you in the next article.

Dear Emperor/Empress 

     Thank you much much for reading!!

entry.title: 9 Habits Of Attractive Women
entry.content:
Do you know some of those women who always look good, like a-l-w-a-y-s. You see the lady walking past you at work or school and your like wow!, and you crazy friend start checking the list, nails check, hair check, glowing skin check, dress check, I mean how does she do it? 

Well, this is my favourite part, unveiling the beauty secrets secrets...... 

Time management 

Is every morning a rush hour 3 for you? Do you wake up to a cupboard of dresses and you say "I don't have a dress" "I don't what to wear"? The good news is you are not alone on this one. Every beauty you see out there is as a result of their time management skills. They know exactly how they want to be seen out of their homes thus they manage themselves accordingly.

Question: on average, how long does it take you to get ready? I mean completely ready-hair, make up, dress and all. Let me say one hour. So here is a solution: set an alarm one hour earlier than your normal wake up time and then, wake up to the first sound of your alarm even if you don't feel like it. Wake up cuz you know the ten minutes magic wont work today.

Outfit prep

Remember that special occasion you preped your outfit for many months before? Do you notice it took you less time to get ready? That is the power of outfit prep it can save about 30 munites of measuring and removing.

Natural Make up 

This step is a choice for all those who dont do make up you could just skip this step.
There are so many make up products out there and ways to put on make up. The secret to beauty is to know the one that fits your face, style and keeps your skin looking fresh.
That is why whenever  possible go for natural make up- you know the no make up make up kinda look thats it. This doesn't take much time to do and it will leave you looking Simple, classy and most of all attractive all day long.

What if you have the perfect idea of what your masterpiece makeup is going to look like and unfortunately you dont have enough time to finish. Well, This is where true confidence comes in, walk tall and flaunt your self like everything is chacks (perfect) and everything would be perfect. 

Charisma

Ask yourself what made you notice that lady who walked past you, or better still what made you admire her?. Well, if you are me, then it was definitely her walk, then secondly her dress, probably the color or the style. That is why we have come to the conclusion that there is something about the way you carry yourself that gives the final touch to your look. 

 If  youre slouching like youre carrying the weight of the world on your shoulders  and youre just twisting your face and youre looking sad and gloomy like everything is wrong. 

Usually, thats what people notice but if you carry yourself with a joyful/courageous walk you smile, you swing your arms, you have a charisma which you may not realize but people would first notice your walk and the energy you bring in to the room before you utter a word. So make that impression count. 

Be clean

Looking good starts from you looking clean from your skin to your clothes. Take a real good shower, scrub your armpits, your toes, back of your ear and check teeth. Why would you leave the house within brushing your teeth. w-h-y? Brush and brush properly even get a mint if you have to. 

Wether you shave or wax, never ler hair over grow any where except on your head. This should be one of those things you just don't do. It is both not healthy and not clean. Once your all clean, the next step is to

Spray 

The goal is never to be caught smelling unfresh. Try picking a soft natural sweet scented spray you love and stick to it. Spray your perfume imediately after applying oil to your skin and hair. So that you will have only the sweet fragrance left. 

Hair 

How would you describe how your hair looks on average. If it's not neat, clean and well combed and oiled, then you really need to step up your game. Do yourself a makeover have a girls night with your bestie, style your hair, go crazy, colour your hair purple anything you want just make sure it's clean and neatly styled. Further, always keep your lips moisturized either with lip gloss or Vaseline as you prefer.

A word

Even if your low on cash, its better to buy one quality nice dress, perfume, makeup tool or wig than to buy the cheap manageable one. If you think about it youll see that thats another way to save money and time in the long run.

More words on:

Tips on how to dress better 

Dress well 

Create for yourself the ideal closet that contains the kind of clothes that fit you body type and your style, clothes that make you to look the way you want to be addressed. Wear the clothes that make you look and feel your best. When you feel good you walk tall and you bring good vibes.

Tip 

In your budget use more of your money for the clothes, that you wear to work or church don't really worry about special occasions and everyday dresses, they will fall into place. 

More words on:

10 things to start doing now to achieve your money goals 

Be your own person

Love your self and be that person that you will admire. Create that story you would like to tell over and over again from this moment on. Start taking yourself seriously, your body goals, money goals, whatever goals you may have start occupying yourself more with achieving them.

A word:

Only you can define beauty dont let others define it for you be unique be your own person dont hesitate look different and feel better if you have to. Make your definition count.

Intelligence 

Match your looks with your knowledge my Empress you can't afford to walk the walk when you can't talk the talk. Yes an attractive woman can do both. When she opens her mouth the ears are ready to listen because wisdom flows out of it. You need to be not just book smart but also life smart you can be the boss lady. 

More words on:

How to be a girl boss

Dear Emperor/Empress 

  Thanks much much for reading!!!

entry.title: 10 Ways To Be A Girl Boss
entry.content:
You see the girl that just walked in with nice dress, high heels, head high, that's the girl she is the boss, she is the man she knows what she wants and she is set to go get it. That could be you. In fact, that would be you in a few minutes. You don't have to be the girl that walks into the class in a rush with her neck bent and folded arms you can be your own boss you can be the man too. The question is How? 

We first need to give you a shot of the best self-confidence boost and a self-doubt erase for any doubts that you may have in yourself.  Say a quick good bye and now you've got this!!

Let's get to unveiling the how right before your eyes....

Know your worth 

How much are you worth? Do you really want to  answer that question, No don't say any amout cuz baybe you are priceless you are worthy of what ever amont there is and more. You are not only gold, you are silver you are Diamond and all the precious things there are. 

Know what you want 

Set goals both personal and financial goals what ever they are, it could be a target for the week or for the month. Having a specific aim will give yoa reason to keep pushing. Don't make plans that depend on other people without them knowing or without you knowing if they are interested. Make plans on how to achieve each goal and give yourself a deadline for each goal.

More words on:

10 things to start doing to achieve your money goals.


Knowledge 

 Knowledge they say is power my Empress and you need to increase your knowledge to grow to becoming the best. Get all the knowledge you need, you can get them from articles like this or books on specific topics of your choice, the goal is to read and learn something new everyday to help get you closer to what you want. 

Dress well 

What did you first like about your cool boss or your celebrity crush? If Im correct then it should either be their appearance or personality. Well, that is what you need too and when it comes to dressing you need to find your style, something that fits the setting and most of all suits you. 

A word

Even on your worst days when you don't feel like leaving the house but you have to some important stuff to do, dont go looking like your problems!  dress up, make up and do rock it, you need to go out there and show the world that there was an island princess in hidding. 

More words on: 

How to look more attractive 

Have a good personality 

Even if you have nothing else, cultivate these three qualites; politeness, humility and respect even to your self (self-respect) having self- respect means that you act with dignity and honor you don't tolorate when people lie to you or treat you unfairly. Being respectful to others means you show consideration for their feelings,wishes and accept them for who they are even if they are diffrent. What does it mean to be humble?

More words on:

How to be humble 

Compliment yourself 

Yes! Why do you have to wait for someone to tell you that you are pretty and that you are the reason why the world is a better place. You can tell yourself that, if you feel pretty then you are pretty it doesn't matter what a or b says.

Start 

Whatever passion or idea you have, just go for it don't over think it as long as you love it and know how to do it. As you grow you will advance, learn new ways, or just you will figure the rest out as you go further in that journey.

Be disciplined 

Create a routine or a schedule for each day and stick to it no matter how hard it may be for you in the begining, remember your goals and convince yourself of the reasons why, this is the driving force.

Have a back up plan 

Just like you can never take only high shoes for a distant journey to a place you have never been, we cannot have only one plan when our whole life depends on us, we need flat shoes, by this I mean a plan B with less risks of faliure. Something we can fall back on in times of need.  

Smile 

A pretty face is a smiling face so smile don't keep your face like you are facing all the problems in the world. Even if you are Smile cuz as the girl boss that you are, we know you would find a solution and everything would be alright. 

Dear Boss lady/Empress 

    Thanks much much for reading!!!
