entry.title: How To Be Better With Money
entry.content:
Is it just me or it feel like the more money we make the more we spend? 

Thinking about when I was younger and earned less (haven knows how I survived) made me realise that there was a better way to use money than me moving from paycheck to paycheck. I started thinking, thinking real much and I think I got it. So this is for all out there who feel the same or just want to be better with money. So the question is....  What is the better way? 

Before we get deep into this, let's first erase any self-doubt, or fear of the unknown that you may feel. And now that your Self-confidence is back to a hundred, you got this!

Let's get to unveiling the money secrets right before your eyes.....

Set financial goals

Start making long-term decisions take a moment to ask yourself: where do you want to be in months or years from now?.Have a clear vision of what you want to achieve, how much you want to have and the things you want acquire before a certain age.
 It is very important that these goals should be part and parcel of you.You May write them down if you have to. So that in your journey, even when you feel like giving up your going to talk your self out of it because you know there is parcel at the end of the road.

Know the difference 

Difference between what? you may wonder. Let me be clear; Know the difference between your wants and your needs.

Take a moment to think about that statement cuz that is one of the keys to becoming a real money emperor. 

Your basic needs are food, shelter and clothing. Everything out of this is a want. Even though sometimes our wants may seem like needs, we need to know the difference to avoid falling into the advertisers traps. Before you buy something ask yourself: Do I really need this? How many times will I use this?. If you find yourself doubting, know that you dont really need it. Don't convince yourself into buying the wants.

A word 

In order to spend wisely, wait till you have enough to buy two or three of a want before you go for it.

Have a budget 

Why would you go shopping without a list and most of all a budget. W-h-y? You would buy the whole store! Literally.   Most often, you'll get things you don't really need. It is in fact, very important to keep a specific amount for each need that is your food, clothes and if you rent your housing and bills especially if you earn a specific amount each month. 

A word

Have a record of how much you spend and what you spent it on for the next month. Then you'll be able to see where all the money is really going to.                    Write down the amount your willing to spend for the month and Make a list of all your expenses for a month and the estimated cost, leaving some extra for your dreams (vacations) and emergencies.

Be disciplined 

Making a budget is one thing but sticking to it is the hard part that is why we are calling on Mr and Mrs discipline to help you stick to your budget and resit the urge to buy that new dress you see on the mannequin through the glass door or the latest BMW car. The easiest way is to remember your goals and your dreams

Don't follow trends

Is it just me or does every single penny go to clothes, bags and shoes. For real though, the latest stuff are usually the most expensive so you certianly wouldn't save much if you want to keep up with all  trends. Moreover, you don't really need the latest stuff to look good or presentable as long as your clothes are clean and fit well, you are good to go.

More words on:

9 habits of attractive women 

 Live according to your means 

No matter how much you earn each month, it is very possible to manage and even have extra at the end of the month the secret is in this statement: live according to your means. This means so many things like don't compare yourself  to anyone. Don't get things you don't really need to impress people instead, live a simple and satisfactory life.

More words on:

How to be a humble and simple person 

Avoid dept 

Sometimes you may have the money but you just dont want to use it, I get the feeling but when you pay for stuff with the money you have (cash) not with a credit card or something like that it helps you to know the real amount you have left. 

Save 

Don't take unessecary loans save money and the best way to do this is to make saving a part of you budget, you don't only save for the rainy days, you save for the fun times too (vacations). You can save more by to cutting down on your expenses;

Transportation if you have a car, you just need something to get you where you want to go nothing too fancy.

Your housing could it be possible for you to move to a cheaper and simpler appartement? Maybe turn of the light before bed and turn of the tap while brushing your teeth?
How much do you spend on food? Do you order or eat out almost all the time? well, eating out costs twice as much as cooking yourself. Make a list of meals to cook instead and try going to the grocery store to get the things you need once a week. It will at the very least save your gas money. 

Invest 

When you have saved up to an extent and you finally see things falling in to place, you have two choices either invest in yourself, or invest to get more and then, spend it on yourself. There are so many businesses you can invest in that is why you need to do proper research on each one before putting your money into it. 
For starters you can put your money in a bank with a high interest rate while thinking of what to invest in.

Be grateful 

What ever stage you may be in achieving your money goals be happy and applaud yourself for how far you're come in even if it's just the beginning stage be happy because you have started and it's better to be late than never. Stop thinking and over thinking about the things you can't afford instead, buy the things you can afford and be happy eating or wearing them because you did not steal them that's your hardwork right there. 

Dear Emperor/Empress 

     Thanks much much for reading!!

link.title: How To Be Better With Money

entry.title: How To Get Rid Of pride And Be Humble
entry.content:
Funny thing is many people dont know that they are proud until someone brings it to their attention. So lets take this quiz before we move ahead: What do your relationships look like now? How often do people approach you with their problems? Has anyone dear ever called you proud? Or Maybe they said your behavior has changed and they some how associated it with pride. There is only one way to know for sure(how to know if you are proud). Even if it's true there is good news, the good news is that we can completely get rid of this bad habit. How??

The best way to get rid of a bad habit is to replace it with a good one so we are replacing pride with a beautiful quality called humility.

First of all, 

Who is a humble person 

Humble people are happy, content and most of all satisfied with their lives. They value themselves and at the same time they put others needs before their own. They find joy in celebrating other's and usually avoid being the center of attention. 

To be humble means so many things including; not buying all the expensive stuff just so the the neighbor next door will notice you. It especially means accepting and making amends for your wrongs.

How To Be Humble 

Do you want to become a humble person?

Let's get to unveiling the 7 secrets right before your eyes....

Be nice

When you walk into the room smile and greet your desk mate, say the magic words please and thank you regularly in your daily conversations even if the person is younger than you or of a lower " class" than you. Treating them the way you would like to be treated will reduce the tension in the air and be a great plus in your humility journey.

Have a balanced view of yourself 

How do you view yourself? List some of your weaknesses? What do you talk about? Take some time to describe yourself. Are you the person of your dreams? If not then,  build yourself to be the nice loving person you would want as a friend. 

More words on;

 Who is a real friend

Listen

 Everyone has something to say regardless of their age or position they just need the chance. So, pay attention to every word that comes out of each person's mouth no matter their age or position, don't just sit spaced out or waiting for your turn to speak. Listen attentively like everything they are saying really matters.

A word 

Success comes through many advisors and the best advice can come from unexpected places.

Learn something new

Humbly raise your hand and ask a question when you don't understand or go to that nerd by the corner and plead for their help instead of bullying them. Honestly, being willing to sit and learn from someone anything that you have no idea on  is the greatest display of humility there is.

On that note I'll like to congratulate you for taking this first step to humility (reading this article) your doing great already.

Apologize 

Three words as simple as "I am sorry" are so rare to hear these days eventhough they are the key to preventing further arguments and future resentment. Even when you do something as small as accidentally smashing another persons foot, apologizing quickly saves you from a quarrel.

More words on:

How to let go of anger 

 Show gratitude  

During the day or at the end of the day find something to be thankful for, not just something you did but some things others did that made things easier for you like your morning coffee, your taxi ride or even just a clean office. No matter how small their contribution was, it was still a contribution and they deserve the credit.

A word 

Looking at the good things others can do and have done will help you see them as human and will help you appreciate their presence more.

Think about it 

Think about some situations that can make you give in to pride and write a plan of action, this should contain exactly what you would say or do in that situation. Identify some things that you used to do that made you less humble and Change your reactions. 

You will get there step-by-step

Dear Emperor/Empress 

Thanks much much for reading!!!

link.title: How To Get Rid Of pride And Be Humble

entry.title: 5 Signs Of Pride That You Just Cant Ignore
entry.content:
Ya 

What is pride 

Pride is the deep feeling of satisfaction you get from your achievements or of the achievements of the ones you are close to. When you put it like this, it is not really wrong but some people take it too far. So, the real question is How do you really know how far is to far?

Well, let me unveil the how right before your eyes.....

Simply put, proud people usually put themselves first, think about only their needs and don't care about who they hurt in the process, they love being the center of attention and crave for praises and compliments even when they don't really deserve it.

Ask yourself :

Do I classify people based on what they have, what they do for a living or their social status? Does where they stand affect the way I treat them negatively?

What you say

Do you find yourself talking alot about the things you have, things you do or have done how strong or how powerful your are? Do you find yourself saying the statement do you know who I am? Or something like that? Do you always find a way to make the conversation about you, the things you like the things you hate, the way you do things, thinking that the other person has nothing to say? Or their opinion doesn't matter?

What you do

How do you react to praises or compliments do you turn the conversation into a your personal journal? How do you react to advice, do you accept or reject the advise based on who is giving it? Do you actually listen or give your full attention to people who are not of your class? How do you treat them? When you speak are your words aimed to make them feel inferior? Would you be happy to hear the same words from others?

 How do you react when someone comes for you to teach them. Do you scold them or say something like "how come you don't know this?". What if you don't know how to do something do you find it easier to ask for help or suffer in silence as Mr or Mrs know it all.

When you do something wrong, do you apologize quickly for your error or do u just expect the other person to understand and forgive you?

Who you associate with 

Do you choose to or not to associate with people just because of their class, social status or wealth? How do you feel about spending time with people of a lower class than you are? Do you cautiously and constantly dread even the thought of it? 

More words on:

How to make real friends 

How do you treat your siblings and friends? Do you listen to them and value their opinions? Do you ever do nice things for them without some other motive?

If you answered yes to one or all of these questions, I have more questions for you- Do you like being this way? Or did you just find yourself this way? Do you want to get rid of this habit? I think you do so, let's get right to it.


How to get rid of pride 

Dear Emperor/Empress 

   Thanks much much for reading!!!

link.title: 5 Signs Of Pride That You Just Cant Ignore

entry.title: 7 Tips To Keep Your Skin Glow Naturally
entry.content:
Shiny and flawless is the ideal description in every girls head of a perfect skin. Have you tried every facial and mask there is to no avail? Have you  been looking for some little things you can do behind the scenes to get faster and better results? If yes! Then you have come to the right place.
let's get to unveiling the 7 secrets right before your eyes......

Wash your face 

You really don't need any expensive product just any natural soap of your choice, clean hands and clean water. Then,wash your face first before bathing in the morning and in the evenings after brushing your teeth.
Also, for best efficiency have a separate soap for washing your hands and another for your face.

How to wash your face 

 Apply your favourite natural soap taking note of the hidden areas like the sides of your nose,towards your mouth and even further to your neck and chest just so this parts don't suffer. 

A word 

If you have acne prone or oily skin, use  warm water to wash your face first inorder to wash away the excess oils and then use cold water for the final rinse.

Use natural products

Natural soaps especially the ones which contain honey, carrots or papaye are usually mild and soothing to the skin and thus perfect for getting healthy skin.  Products with the lables  Certified organic or green are often truly natural. Moreover, they have a really natural and soft smell. 

A word 

Different people have different skin types so you have to keep trying different kinds of natural soaps until you find the one that soothes your skin perfectly.

Eat healthy

Am sure you saw this coming right? yes! "what you put in is what you take out"- if you know what I mean. Experts say eating carrots and nuts such as almonds have been proven to greatly improve your skin's health and glow. However, it is best to experiment to see which foods have the best glowing effect on your skin.

Stay hydrated 

     Drinking enough water a day keeps the acne away.....
 I just made that up but technically,  it is true since acne/Pimples is a cleansing method for the body. So regular sips of water will help remove all those things via sweat or urine and it will keep your skin looking fresh all day.

A word 

Drink warm water containing honey and fruits with vitamin c (like lemon) which are  also rich in antioxidants especially the morning and evenings will go a long way in making your skin glow. 
You may prefer to drink turmeric tea since lemons make some people lose weight.

 Clothing 

Look at the difference between your thighs and your feet at the end of a sunny day and you will understand how much the sun can affect your skin. What if you dont have sunscreen? A pro tip is to wear clothes that protect your skin from the harsh effect of the sun. Also, if your outfit permits come along with a hat and sunglasses.

Tip
Wear cover shoes such as boots or canvas in stead of sandals when  possible.  

Climate change 

I am not the kind of person to say that "a hot place makes you darker and cold place makes you lighter" or otherwise. what I will say is that if you change location even just for a vacation you need to intensify your regular routine to get better results.

Oil your skin 

Leaving your skin dry or whitish will definitely not make it glow. That's why you can use good moisturizing oil to keep your body soft and smooth. If you dont know which oil suits you best, you may choose to use any baby oil of your choice since they are mild on the skin and usually good for all skin types. 

Did you know? Applying oil on your skin in the evenings after a shower can is usually more effective than in the morning before work.

A word 
When you wash your face, does your nose and/or skull feel oily after munites? if yes then,  in the evenings before bed wash your face and apply no oil to it but if it feels dry apply oil to your face before bed. (Try this for a week) before you continue oiling your face again. 

Face Check 
Check you body and face especially for any Pimples or blackspots and pop them with clean washed hands when due or visit the dermatologist as soon as possible. This will allow your skin look fresh and smooth.

Exfoilate 

I obviously couldn't end with out mentioning this. It just means you scrub your face and body regularly at least twice a month for starters. 
  Also, Avoid kneeling or putting your elbow and knees on hard surfaces as this will make them darker and rough with time.

Nails  

I just felt like this was also important to add your nails are an important accessory to the skin and if left unkempt or dirty would remove the focus from your glowing skin to their ugh!

A word 

There are so many things that can improve your skin such as exercising, sleeping, less stress and having a face massage regularly but I know you know so... neh.

    Dear Empress/Emperor 

       Thanks much much for reading!!!

link.title: 7 Tips To Keep Your Skin Glow Naturally

entry.title: How to prepare yourself for life after university
entry.content:
Finally you are as free as a bird you live alone, what more can you ask for. Well, let's fast forward to few years ahead you are done with school, you are broke and searching for a job. How time flies!

For sure by now you are wishing that this shouldn't be your story. Well, since you are among the fortunate people to read this article you just might avoid that. But How??

Let me unveil these secrets right before your eyes....

Be specific 

 What do you want to learn? why you want to learn it and what you would do with your knowledge?.These are all questions you need to ask or do research on and give yourself the all responses you need and to reduce your worries.

A word 

Ask advice from someone who took the same course you are about to take and learn from their mistakes.

Make sure too that the school actually teaches what you want to study.

More words on:

 5 things to consider before choosing a career path.

Take the course 

Before leaving home you told your parents you were going to school. So, to school you go. Even if you don't feel like it sometimes, just remember why you are there and you will see few years ahead that you are making the right choice. 

Set goals 

Having short-term goals like being early for each class and long-term goals like passing your exams with good grades. Whether it is academic or secular, goals are important as they give you something to focus on, something to look forward to and a reason to celebrate yourself as you walk through your life journey.

More words on:

Things to start doing now to achieve your money goals 

Learn a skill

 There are so many online and offline course you can take while waiting for your degree pick any one you like and burry your head into learning it, cuz this is the only time when you will be free to take money from your parents without your inner self judging you. So, use their money wisely- use it to learn a skill that will help you with the next tip. 

Save money 

Have you ever heard the statement save for the rainy days? This time around we are not just saving for rainy days we are saving as a necessity  for future peace of mind. Also,no matter how little you save as long as you have a target amout and save regularly, you are doing great.

A word

Disciplining yourself and sticking to your money goals now, can help you form the habit of acting wisely when you have more money and more responsibility 

more words on:

How to overcome self-doubt 

Explore

Make new friends, try new positive things, take risks, look for new opportunities and challenge yourself. While focusing on your studies, you also need to make memories that you will live to remember with a smile on your face.

more words on:

How to make real friends 

Tip 

Don't let anything distract you. Even though your parents may not be there with you, you are representing them and they trust that you will live up to their high moral standards.


Dear Emperor/Empress 

     Thanks much much for reading!!

link.title: How to prepare yourself for life after university

entry.title: 5 Things To Consider Before Choosing A Career
entry.content:
What will I become in future? This is a question many youths have in mind and the various options and career paths don't make it any easier to answer. If you are here now it is either you are one of those youths or you just like reading!

The big question is What can make a person choose one career and the other person choose another? 

Let me do the honors of unveiling the somethings you should consider right before your eyes......

Your passion 

You may end up doing what ever you choose to do now for the rest of your life so you have to choose wisely.

Yes!! whether your like something or not affects your performance in that trade. It maybe tough to figure out but think about that one time when you saw someone doing something and you said to yourself or to your best friend, I would do that someday. Well.... that's how you know. 

Your knowledge 

There are some academic requirements for almost all careers but we would emphasize more on basic and informal knowledge. Ask  yourself do you love helping people? Do your love taking care of people? Do you love fixing things? Do you love being alone,quiet?what is that one thing that you can talk confidently about for hours and hours?so on then you will narrow your options 

A word 

You may answer YES to all the questions above but there are definitely some aspects of one that you prefer over the other so please take your time to analyze all your options before deciding 

Finances

What if you have all the above checked but then there is no means? It is still your choice whether to continue with the path your parents/ Guardian choose and switch to what you love later on in life or you finance yourself to do what you love.(Please do not hold a grudge on your parents for not being able to provide) 

More words on:

How to forgive and let go of anger

Plans 

Do you have the typical plan to get married and have kids? How would your career affect your relationship with your partner and your kids? How would your career affect YOU? You also need to plan ahead and if possible with your partner before time.

More words on:

21 questions to consider before getting into a serious relationship 

A word 

Choose a career that would give you as much time as you need. Remember that there are online courses you can take later on if there is a need.

Income

 Are you the bread winner of your Family? That is, Does the entire family look up to you to provide? This is very likely if you are the first born or in an African home.                                              Then you need to pick a career that can care for the  responsibilities you have now and even later because they are going no where. In fact, they may even double once you leave school.

A word 

Here are things you can do while at school to prepare yourself for life after college 

Tip 

Be specific on what you want to learn and as the saying goes if you know where you are going to, you will know how to get there.

Dear Emperor/Empress 

     Thanks much much for reading!!!

link.title: 5 Things To Consider Before Choosing A Career

entry.title: 5 Ways To Let Go Of Anger Towards Someone
entry.content:
To err is human and to forgive is divine is a statement most of you have surely heard of many times. But trust me it's not easy to actually forgive, if   someone you loved so much hurts your feelings or does something that really breaks your heart.

 The good news is, it is not impossible.  you can really let go of this anger that is gradually turning into hate.

Let me unveil the secrets right before your eyes....... 

 Allow yourself feel

When someone does what you don't like, if possible, leave the place and take sometime to breathe, feel and think. Breathe fresh air,feel your surrounding Then, now you can Think of the person/ people What do you feel? Is it anger, pain, do you feel tears, it's okay allow yourself feel what ever.

Think of you

   Please ask and give yourself the most honest response. What is really making you angry? How is this anger affecting you? That is: Are you struggling with confidence? Or self-doubt? Do you have nightmares?. What are some things you used to do that you don't do anymore? 

More words:

How to overcome self-doubt 

A word 

No matter who it was that hurt you and no matter how deep the cut was I know you are capable of healing and letting go. If not for them but for your peace of mind.

Think of them 

     How do you think the person who made you angry feels? Will they feel sad for making you feel bad? Or do they not even care? Just knowing that they don't care how you feel should let you know that they are not worth it. They are not worthy of your time, love and tears.

 If they care, have talk with them, tell them how you truly feel say everything don't hold back or feel vulnerable, you are doing this for you and not them and when you are finally done talking You know it's time to let go of the memories of anger, hate and painful feelings. 

Write 

    Writing has a way of helping you let go that you will only realise months later. When you write unleash your thoughts, clear your mind, don't hold on to some of them no matter how much it hurts. You can also talk to a real friend 

More words: 

How to make real friends 

A word 

Pick up sand or carry water in your palms think of the anger,  feel it all and now drop by drop literally let go of the pieces, memories and finally the anger.

Sing 

Do you like singing? If yes, this tip is for you. If someone just annoys you or makes you feel like exploding, then just start humming or singing out loud any song of your choice. Most of the time your will end up singing a song that relates to the problem at hand 

Make new memories 

  Do you like dancing, singing, drawing, cooking or site seeing. Then, do it every single thing you love go ahead and do it celebrate yourself for being free and fill your heart with the things that bring you joy. I am proud of you my Empress!!!

Dear Emperor/Empress 

      Thank much much for reading!!!

link.title: 5 Ways To Let Go Of Anger Towards Someone

entry.title: How To Make Real Friends
entry.content:
Who is a true friend 

There are many definitions for a friend but I'll use these descriptions to help you see the real meaning.

A good friend, is some one who can make you laugh even when the whole world seems sad, commend you when you're right and encourages you to get on the right track when you're on the wrong one, someone who can see that you are sad even when you are smiling and most of all someone you feel comfortable with. That's why 99 percent of the time your best friend is your partner.

Know this:

   Friends come in different shapes and forms. They can be the same age as you, younger or older than you, your schoolmate, your partner, work mate, neighbor, siblings and surprisingly your parents. 

How to find a friend. 

It's your first day at a new school. It seems like every one is already paired except you. Is this how the rest of the year is going to be?Hell no! I say we have to fix this but how you wonder? 

Let me do the honors of unveiling the secrets right before your eyes.....

 Be yourself 

"But I am not cool" even I don't want to be friends with me. Don't say that you really need to overcome this self-doubt of yours and look at the bigger picture. No one ever wants a counter fit and if they get one by accident they will exchange it for the original and you are the only original version of you. Why would you leave that to be another persons counter fit. 

Also you will not feel comfortable and free around them because you are scared that one day they will find out the truth so..... 

Be friend material 

It's not like I just made this up? maybe I did but that's not the point. The point is, what kind of friend do you want? List some specific characteristics like kind, conversational, hardworking and so on. Can you say the same thing of yourself? As you may know magnets attract other magnets very quickly. 

Reach out

I am definitely sure there is someone in your class that matches your descriptions at least slightly, so what are you waiting for. Have some confidence in yourself, Go over there and say Hi!  It's not weird trust me.

Don't expect too expect much 

I had to include this disclaimer to the list. Look at every single description of a good friend above, it is built gradually just like in  every other relationship. Slowly but surely you will get comfortable enough to say everything you feel like saying.

Be ready to listen 

Yes! both of you are from different backgrounds and there is no freaking way you can know each other without you listening keenly to their stories even if you don't know how to respond.  

Dear Emperor/Empress 

  Thanks much much for reading!!!

entry.title: How to know if they are willing to be more than friends
entry.content: So I have this person we have been really good friends for a while now. now I don't want to be more than friends and I have the feeling that he wants to too I don't know for sure but

entry.title: 5 Reasons For Divorce And How To Prevent It
entry.content:
Every relationship is based on two things trust and respect, whether between, a teacher and student, boss and employee mother and child or husband and wife. When you respect you earn trust, pretty simple right.

 Why then are some   relationships short leave? Are you in a relationship and Do you feel like your marraige is falling apart and you are not ready to let go of the pieces? There just might be something you can do.

Let me have the honor of unveiling the secrets right before your eyes......

Lack communication. 

This is the number on reason for separation in most marriages. It usually starts with you not narrating the little quarrel you had out of home or not saying the real reason why you don't want something then you not even talking at all. Be your partner's best friend the first person you should want to tell something to good or bad should be him or her.

When there is something wrong, Talk about it calmly and if needed state specific examples of when the other person did wrong cuz it is easier to understand with examples.

A word 

 Communicate not shouting or complaining. It involves really listening keenly not just because you are looking for a response.

Tip

Call each other during the day to just say random things that happened during the day and remind yourselves of your love. Eat together, listen to each other talk 

 No spark

Let me ask you a question, how did you celebrate your last anniversary? Whether  you are married,  engaged or just living together you need to keep fanning the flames of your relationship. How?? Surprise each other. Who said only the guy is allowed to surprise you. Even if you have kids you can put them to sleep early or send them on weekend or better still, you go for the weekend. 

A word 

If you expect to be treated special treat him special and like wise for a guy. Also take note of some questions to consider before getting into a serious relationship.

No care for yourself 

Big top, pyjamas,bad hair... does that describe how you look at home most of the time, if so you need to step up your game lady, allow him see your naturally glowing skin, look good and smell good as often as possible. 

More words:

Habits of attractive women 

No Compliments 

Did he wear that shirt that makes him younger, did she just do her hair, of course she knows she looks good but hearing it from you will be a 10 over 10 in fact it would boost her confidence from 5 to 50 and you will definitely make her day. 

No fun

Of course you both may work and have busy days still you need to have time for each other. A simple well planned heart to heart talk under the stars may go a long way it building you bond as a couple.

A word 

Do things together both small things like a walk down the road and big things like watching a movie, laundry, gardening and so on.

 Appreciate each other 

Does she cook or do the laundry? Does he help with the kids or clean the garden? Appreciate her and Appreciate him. A simple thank you even for the smallest things will show appreciation and make her feel important. 

A word:

Think about when you were still dating what are some things you used to do that you don't do any more.

 Apologize quickly 

Have you ever said something and you after sometime you feel like you wouldn't have said it or do you have many unresolved issues with your mate. It would be much easier to  forgive if you apologized as soon as the crime is committed. More over,don't allow pride (how get rid of pride) cause you to think that only the one who did wrong has to apologize. As long as the apology is heartfelt it is a be a plus for you.

More words on:

How to forgive and let go of anger 

Your marraige or relationship may be at the verge of collapse but one thing is sure, if you both are not ready to let go, and you can work it out. Together 

Dear Emperor/Empress 

     Thanks much much for reading!!!

link.title: 5 Reasons For Divorce And How To Prevent It

entry.title: 5 Major must knows for Every Relationship
entry.content:
Consider before marriage 

 Finally, you have met him/her and you just can't take your eyes of him, you feel like you two are inseperable it seems like a fairytale. Then, the best thing happens he proposed and you said Yes. It's just like in the movies.  You may be thinking what could possibly go wrong?

Well, let's think again there are some things you need to agree on before the D-day.

Let me unveil these 5 secrets right before your eyes......

Family 

Yes of course, by now you have met his mother and entire family he has met yours too but the big question is Would the Family be involved in your marraige? That is when you have issues (which will come up) Would you call a Family meeting? Or talk about it as a couple 

Housing 

where would you two live? If in your own house great but if with a relative how does your partner feel about it? Have you tried visiting for a few days to see what it would look like? Are you comfortable?  Visiting: Are Family members allowed to visit you guys? If so when? (That is how many days after the wedding) should do they call before coming? Or is it cultural for your to be doors open when ever.

Finances 

Money they say is the root of all evil. So my Empress have you discussed? Are you going to work? If yes. Is he aware of your work schedule? How would he feel if you get a raise or a promotion? If not. Is it my Emperor who is providing for everything?

Personal 

Why do you love him or why does he love you? What qualites in particular is it the way you care for people? The way you respect them? The way you carry your self? Or is it it just your
glowing skin and physical beauty? Do you his future plans? Does he know yours? Can you fit into the plan or are you willing to make some adjustments. Have you made new plans together?
     For my Emperor (him) how does he react if some one disrespects you? What if it is a family member? What if someone else keeps staring at you while your at dinner or worse sends you a note? One the scale of one to ten how will you rate his reaction? Is it loving and kind or angry and harsh? 

How often do you talk? Do you talk about your lives, and personal decisions? Even the little one's like wether to take a client or not. Do you have clear boundaries of the things allowed in your relationship?

Children 

 Of course he loves kids I've seen him carry people's kids before. That's great but it is is a completely different story when they live with you, the bathing, the laundry not to talk about the  running around. Does he want this, if so great if not do you love him enough to live without these cute little trouble makers?

I know these are so many things think about but have some confidence in yourself and in your partner 

Tip 

If you are still to agree on some things with your partner please don't make it a question and answer session but a  conversation remember to talk with him/her not to him.

When it comes to family being involved it may be sensitive but you need to be open to each other and really listen.

My advice my Empress is that when problems come don't  attack each other attack the problem. 

Do your best to avoid the words you never and you always. 

remember it is a relationship think not of what is best for you but what is best for us 

These tips can help you prevent separation or divorce in the long run 

You can start the by saying babe(or whatever you sweet names are) I just realised I haven't asked you this question yet. How do you expect your married life to look like? 

Dear Emperor/Empress,

    Thanks much much for reading!!!

link.title: 5 Major must knows for Every Relationship

entry.title: 7 Ways To Overcome Self-doubt and self-criticism
entry.content:
Surprisingly, no matter how strong, beautiful, intelligent or fast we are,

Overcome self-doubt 
As we grow older we can't help but look at other people who are either handsome, or more beautiful, stronger or more intelligent than we are and you know compare ourselves to them. It normally isn't wrong but when it starts blinding our eyes from seeing the beauty in us then it needs to stop.      

The big question is How? I'll do the honors of unveiling these secrets right before your eyes....... 

 Be kind to yourself 

First things first......How can you see so many nice things about others and not even a single nice thing to say about yourself! H-o-w? Don't even tell me there is nothing to like. Take a moment to think until you find something that you love about yourself both form the inside (qualites) and from the out side (physique).

There is a solution 

   Yes there is if there is a problem then there is a solution it is either you haven't found it yet or you don't want to accept it.                        

 If it's people talking that is the problem, don't let it get to you. Am sure your like "easy for you to say". It's because I know that the people talking they either don't know you, don't care about you or they want to hurt you and  if you don't LET them they can NEVER hurt you. Read that again please.

More words on:

How to be a that girl 

Talk

    Do you usually have small talk with your siblings or parents? If not, I know how weird it sounds but there should atleast be that one person who is trustworthy enough for you to  confide in. Even if there is no-one else, who is the best person to encourage you than you, be your own bestie tell yourself what you need to hear, tell yourself positive things like "I got this" "I can do this" and so on. 

More words on:

How to make real friends.

A word 

There are some things in life that you can't control but the one thing you can always control is (how you deal with) your reaction to it.

Write

I'm sure you saw this coming, have a book where you write about your day. I mean everything the fun times(things that made you happy), sad stories (even about that pimple that just appeared on your glowing skin )and overwhelming time also write about how you overcame the challenges for each day and you will see how much of an Emperor/ Empress you are.

Give compliments 

Remember the last time someone gave you a compliment, remember how happy you felt, especially if you didnt expect it. Keep memories like that very close. 

When you try to help others even in very small ways like giving honest compliments, youll see how happy it makes them and it makes you lowkey happy too. Secondly, you will be more focused on helping or finding the good in them, that you have less time to worry about your problems or whatever is making you doubt yourself.

A word:

Sometimes you worry too much about what you say and do because thats you also analyze what others say and do. So, if you do your best to see the good in others and overlook their wrong then maybe just maybe, youll be able to find the good in you too. 

Walk down memory lane 

     Think about something that made you sad before,  what helped you walk past that stage and  regain your confidence? Not only does this reduce self-doubt it helps increase self-esteem.

A word 

Have a phrase that you can say to yourself when your feeling down like for me it is "smile to every challenge" and really smile after saying that, it's funny but it gives you a less tense look at the situation. 

Don't expect too much 

Expecting to much from yourself is putting a kind of mental pressure on you that you may not realize. So try to set realistic expectations and don't hold back from doing something just because you feel you are not going to do it perfect. Instead, humble yourself and be willing to Learn from your mistakes.

A word 

Know what you can and can't do, do the things you can and if there is a need learn the things you can't do, then just do it.

 Set a goal

Think about some nice qualites (love, patience, kindness) you would like to cultivate or some realistic things you would like to achieve maybe by the the end of the week or month. Then, track your progress and applaud yourself (I mean actually clap I need to hear the sounds) for a job welldone.

Don't postpone your happiness 

  It's  not what people do that ruin your day it   is how you react to what people do that makes the difference. Small laughs over even the dumest things can make your day better. So now you may go back and( dont just smile) laugh out loud at the funny parts of this article.

A word 

 You need to act and the time is now that movie you have been waiting to watch, that game you have been waiting to play, that thing you have been waiting for the right time to do, wait no more go Go NOW!!

 Dear Emperor/Empress 

        Thanks much much for reading!!!

.

link.title: 7 Ways To Overcome Self-doubt and self-criticism

entry.title: How To Boost Your Self-Confidence
entry.content:
How to be confident 

 FOR sure you have watched movies or read books about rich people and the authority they have the confidence in their walk and talk and you may ask yourself how can I be like that? How can I come out of my shell and show the world the real me?

Well let me unveil the secrets 4 right before your eyes........

Believe in yourself 

You might be thinking if I believed in myself I wouldn't be reading this article but to be honest with you that's the first step to true confidence.

This is because your mindset actually matters. Think about the last time you were bent on doing something like cooking that dish you like so much, getting that perfect score or even just telling that one person who made you mad that you were mad at them. 

Do you remember how much your inner self kept talking and convincing you that that was the right thing to do and how happy you felt when you finally did it. 
    My Empress that is the superpower you have that no one else has control over, once you can tell your self "I've got this" even when the whole world says you don't, you have a plus one for yourself.

Walk tall 

There is something about walking with your head raised that adds to your charisma and definitely your confidence also. When you walk into the room, face to the crowd and allow your eyes scan the area a little. Then, when you stop stand up straight, occupy as much space as possible so as to look and feel confident. Finally when you sit, keep your back upright and comfortable.

A word 

Place books on your head and try to balance your self making sure your head is raised. Also wearing good shoes, looking good and smelling good would be an extra.

More words 
Secret tips on how to get a glowing skin naturally 

Smile 

  Okay so I'm not saying that you should have a permanent Smile on your face like a clown but at least you need to smile as often as possible even when you feel stressed or shy. 
Smiling and thinking of positive things like the little nice things that have happened during your day instead of that one person who annoyed you this morning would give you the clear head you need to feel confident.

A word 

Try to speak in a louder volume than usual.

Be yourself

There is no one way to look or dress up or do anything just be yourself and do things the way you are most comfortable with, do it with joy and with your head raised cuz that's true confidence, nothing beats that.
N-o-t-h-i-n-g!

Focus on your strengths 

Before I continue with this point pause a little and think about you skills . It could be creativity,communication honesty, gratitude and all these little qualities that make you, you. 
When you ask yourself "what is stopping me from doing so and so?" Instead of "I can not do so and so".You will finally see your true potential.
 You are beautiful/handsome and confident in every single way . I know that and you should too. 


Find out more ways to overcome self-doubt here 

  Dear Emperor/Empress 

    Thanks much much for reading !!!


Beware of over confidence and pride  always stay humble.
